channel.title: Phone Fear Food Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Fear Food Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: stupid sleep patterns..
item.description: so I couldn’t sleep again. I ended up finishng the book I started - which is always a good feeling. I ended up starting a second book.. but I put it away with fear that if I didn’t I woudl finish it too and it would be 8 in the morning. I suppose this is one of those days where I coudl afford to not sleep. but it would really wear on me.
